name: ホーガンズアレイ
summary: Hogan's Alley (ホーガンズアレイ Hōganzu Arei?) is a 1984 video game by Nintendo. It was one of the first games to use a light gun as an input device. The game presents players with "cardboard cut-outs" of villains and innocent civilians. The player must shoot the villains and spare the innocent people.
